Title: Relates to providing a retroactive tax exemption for Chabad of Hewlett Jewish Center Inc.
Summary: Provides a retroactive tax exemption for Chabad of Hewlett Jewish Center Inc. for the 2013-2014 school tax and 2014 general tax.
ActClause: AN ACT in relation to permitting Chabad of Hewlett Jewish Center Inc. to file an application for certain real property tax exemptions
